      • validateWavelengthCalibration

        public boolean validateWavelengthCalibration(java.util.List<java.lang.Double> wavenumbers,
                                             java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> pixels)
        Validate collected wavelength calibration data
        Parameters:
        wavenumbers - Polystyrene Peak Wavenumbers
        pixels - Photon Counts at Polystyrene Peak Wavenumbers
        Returns:
        True, if collected Wavelength Calibration passes validation, False otherwise

        Returns:

      • getSummaryRunSpectra

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.Double,java.lang.Double>> getSummaryRunSpectra()
        Get Summary Spectra from Run Validation
        Returns:
        Map with key being min,max,mean and collected and Value being the corresponding Spectrum

      • darknoiseValidation

        Validate Dark Noise Spectra
        Parameters:
        wavelengths - Wavelengths
        pixels - Photon Counts
        integrationtime - Integration Time used to get the Dark noise
        Returns:
        True if passed validation, False otherwise

      • caf2Validation

        public boolean caf2Validation(java.util.List<java.lang.Double> wavelengths,
                              java.util.List<java.lang.Double> pixels,
                              java.lang.Double integrationtime,
                              java.lang.Double laserPower)
        Validate CaF2 Spectrum
        Parameters:
        wavelengths - Wavelength of CaF2 Spectrum to validate
        pixels - Photon Counts of CaF2 Spectrum to validate
        integrationtime - Integration Time for which CaF2 Spectrum was acquired
        laserPower - Laser Power used during collection of CaF2 Spectrum
        Returns:
        True if passed validaton, False otherwise
